scripts.db:mongo: cd mongo && docker compose -f docker-compose.mongo.yml up -d
scripts.db:mysql: cd mysql && docker compose -f docker-compose.mysql.yml up -d
scripts.db:elasticsearch: cd elasticsearch && docker compose -f docker-compose.elasticsearch.yml up -d
scripts.db:postgresql: cd postgresql && docker compose -f docker-compose.postgresql.yml up -d
scripts.db:alloydb: cd alloydb && docker compose -f docker-compose.alloydb.yml up -d
scripts.db:stop: docker compose -f mongo/docker-compose.mongo.yml down && docker compose -f mysql/docker-compose.mysql.yml down && docker compose -f elasticsearch/docker-compose.elasticsearch.yml down && docker compose -f postgresql/docker-compose.postgresql.yml down && docker compose -f alloydb/docker-compose.alloydb.yml down
scripts.benchmark:mongo: npm run db:mongo && node mongo/generate_sample_data.js && node benchmark.js mongo && npm run db:stop
scripts.benchmark:mysql: npm run db:mysql && node mysql/generate_sample_data.js && node benchmark.js mysql && npm run db:stop
scripts.benchmark:postgresql: npm run db:postgresql && node postgresql/generate_sample_data.js && node benchmark.js postgresql && npm run db:stop
scripts.benchmark:alloydb: npm run db:alloydb && node alloydb/generate_sample_data.js && node benchmark.js alloydb && npm run db:stop
scripts.benchmark:elasticsearch: npm run db:elasticsearch && node elasticsearch/generate_sample_data.js && node benchmark.js elasticsearch && npm run db:stop
